title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Thoroughly gather and document the project requirements, including: chatbot's functionality, security features, integration with existing systems (specify APIs or SDKs if known), user personas (include job roles and user behavior expectations), expected usage scenarios (with examples), data privacy and compliance considerations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, or industry-specific regulations), performance and scalability requirements (response time, maximum concurrent users, etc.), and edge cases for each requirement. Consider incorporating usability heuristics such as discoverability, feedback, consistency, and minimalism to improve user experience.

title: Design System Architecture for SecurityChatbot
description: Design the overall system architecture for the SecurityChatbot, including the chatbot's components, data flow, security mechanisms, and integration with existing systems. Consider scalability, maintainability, performance requirements, high availability, and compliance with relevant security standards and regulations. The design should emphasize on privacy-preserving techniques to ensure user data confidentiality.
dependencies: Identify Security Requirements and Compliance Standards

title: Develop Chatbot Frontend
description: Implement the chatbot's user interface, including the chat window, input/output handling, and user authentication.

title: Develop Chatbot Backend
description: Implement the chatbot's backend logic, including natural language processing, security advice generation, and integration with external systems.

title: Implement Security Mechanisms
description: Develop and integrate security features, such as user authentication, data encryption, and secure communication channels.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing and retrieving security advice, user data, and chat logs.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy and develop test cases to ensure the chatbot's functionality, security, and performance.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the chatbot application.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user guides, FAQs, and other documentation to assist employees in using the chatbot effectively.
